function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Data security and privacy concerns in the context of pandemic regulations","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Financial constraints leading to reduced investment in iot projects","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increasing labor costs for device installation under social contact restrictions","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Magnified shortcomings in iot technology during the pandemic, such as ease of device installation and data security","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fluctuating demands for medical equipment","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Behavioral shifts in individuals and organizations","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased use of iot in industrial settings may lead to higher risk of disease transmission due to increased interaction with shared equipment and spaces.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Additive manufacturing to meet increased demand for medical supplies may lead to potential contamination and safety risks in the production process.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of contagious diseases may disrupt manufacturing operations due to absenteeism, reduced operational hours, and limited on-site staff.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential spread of covid-19 due to ineffective vaccine roll-out strategies","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decrease in economic activity leading to budget cuts in industrial iot iiot adoption","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of supply chain visibility and resilience during pandemics or disasters","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of uv light for vehicle cabin cleaning may not be effective in
